To provide access to health care (basic & specialized) to EPAM supported schools and communities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Environment (Supports UN-SDG Goal 7 & To create sustainable & environment-friendly campuses supported by EPAM. Creating awareness of Climate Change, Saving Environment etc.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Women Empowerment (Supports UN SDG Goal 5):\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" To promote gender equality and provide economic opportunities to women by supporting vocational training centers etc. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT Projects (Supports UN SDG Goal 11): \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To leverage EPAMers skills and knowledge to strengthen communities that we live in by partnering and advancing like-minded organizations to solve various social problems using technology.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM India: COVID-19 Response\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have been collaborating with Nirmaan, a Non-Profit Organisation working closely with Department of Health & Family Welfare which is the Government Wing/Agency responsible for fighting COVID-19 in Telangana, India. We have donated Isolation Beds, Ventilators, PPE Kits & Sanitizers for government hospitals who are fighting COVID-19.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":100182,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67215c74-5f53-4796-82a1-49c3e30ee98d/india.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67215c74-5f53-4796-82a1-49c3e30ee98d/india.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"india.jpg\",\"name\":\"india.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"67215c74-5f53-4796-82a1-49c3e30ee98d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":730,\"height\":485},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":95323,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e32509ac-56df-426f-bacf-48c215e77625/CSR NEW.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e32509ac-56df-426f-bacf-48c215e77625/CSR NEW.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"CSR NEW.JPG\",\"name\":\"CSR NEW.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e32509ac-56df-426f-bacf-48c215e77625\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":952,\"height\":489},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
